entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries changing to a few rain showers near noon. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few showers. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog patches developing near midnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few showers. High 7.
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 7. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023
